Class Institute

      • retseats

        public int retseats()

      • decrease

        public void decrease()
        decrease number of available seats by 1

      • apply

        public void apply(Candidate c,
         int t)
        Adds application of student
        t = general rank of applied student.
        This is added to the hashmap of institute
        Applicable for Gale Shapley algo
        Parameters:
        c - DS Candidate to be added
        t - General rank of DS candidate

      • filter

        public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> filter()
        filters the applicants
        Adds all the applications to waitlisted, Sorts the waitlisted as per their GE rank
        Takes the top applications
        Returns:
        Returns the rejected list of candidates

      • applymerit

        public java.lang.Boolean applymerit(Candidate x,
                           int rank)
        This function distributes seats between DS candidates.
        Used for Merit Order Algo
        Parameters:
        x - applying candidate
        rank - rank of the candidate used to compare with quotaextrank
        Returns:
        returns whether student waitlisted for program
